page.title: 12RELIGION
page.content: This area forms part of the Anglican United Benefice of Stanton St.Quintin, Hullavington & Grittleton, with Leigh Delamere & Norton & Littleton Drew. The church in Hullavington is called St. Mary Magdelen. In a typical month there are four services attended by 23.75 people. At the Mount Zion Christian Fellowship Chapel in Gibb's Lane they have 8 services a month which about 30 people attend. On the R.A.F. Camp is a Garrison Church named after St.Alban. It is Anglican. At the back of the church there is a chapel for Roman Catholics. There are 4 services a month attended by 30 Anglicans & 10 Roman Catholics. In Watts Lane is a Methodist Chapel.There is a monthly service attended by 10 people. A similar chapel at Stanton St. Quintin has 7 worshippers.
